original_text: Then Pharaoh called for his wise men and his magicians to come to him. The Egyptian magicians did the same thing as Aaron. They used their secret magic to do it.
korean_text: 바로도 현인들과 마술사들을 부르매 그 애굽 요술사들도 그들의 요술로 그와 같이 행하되

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh called for his wise men
and his magicians to come to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 마법사들이 그에게 오게 했다

sentences.original_text: The Egyptian magicians did the same thing
